description: This source file defines the HomeScreen component for a React Native mobile application. It renders the main interface for displaying, refreshing, and managing notes, including UI elements such as headers, note list, floating action button, and modal for editing notes. It also interacts with a local SQLite database to fetch and initialize notes.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously initializes the database and loads all notes into state.

methods.name: onAdd
methods.description: Prepares state for creating a new note and opens the modal.

methods.name: onOpen
methods.description: Sets the selected note and opens the modal for editing.

methods.name: onSaved
methods.description: Refreshes the notes list after saving a note.
